title: OpenDeekWiki - AI-Powered Code Knowledge Base
description: OpenDeekWiki is an open-source project inspired by DeepWiki, built on .NET 9 and Semantic Kernel. It helps developers better understand and use code repositories, providing code analysis, documentation generation, and more.

home.title: AI-Powered Code Knowledge Base
home.subtitle: OpenDeepWiki is an open-source project inspired by DeepWiki, built on .NET 9 and Semantic Kernel. It helps developers better understand and use code repositories, providing code analysis, documentation generation, and more.

form.title: Add Repository
form.auth_tooltip: If it's a private repository, please enable this option and fill in the credentials
form.git_password_placeholder: Enter Git password or access token
form.git_token_tip: For GitHub, Personal Access Token is recommended
form.upload_formats: Supported formats: zip, gz, tar, br
form.upload_tip: Only zip, gz, tar, br formats are supported
form.drag_text: Click or drag file to this area to upload
form.error_message: Failed to add, please try again
form.invalid_file: Invalid file object, please upload again
form.format_error: Only zip, gz, tar, br formats are supported
form.password_required: Please enter Git password or access token
form.branch_tooltip: Select the branch of the repository you want to use, click the Load Branches button to get all available branches
form.branch_load_failed: Failed to get branch list, please enter branch name manually
form.branch_load_error: Error getting branch list, please check repository address and authentication information
form.auth_required: Authentication is enabled, please enter username and password/token first

last_repo.title: Query Repository
last_repo.address_placeholder: Enter the repository address you've submitted before
last_repo.check_address: Please check if the repository address is correct
last_repo.error: Error querying repository, please try again later
